cast.name: 里卡多·奥尔蒂斯 Ricardo Ortiz

introduction: As a materialistic teen, all Nick (16) cares about is opening his Christmas gifts. Tired of Christmas chores and family events, Nick wishes a little too hard and accidentally makes Christmas disappear from the world. As the only one who remembers the existence of Christmas, Nick begins to realize just how the holiday has touched and molded others' lives over the years. Now, not only will Nick need to bring his presents back, but see that his friends and family return to normal by learning the true meaning of Christmas.
